name.ja: ネクメイド・トリックメント

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster, send 1 face-up Zombie Type monster from your field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Change up to 2 Attack Position monsters on your opponent's field to face-up Defense Position. This turn, your opponent cannot Tribute those monsters for a Tribute Summon, nor use them as material for a Ritual Summon.
